name: Dutch Treats Match3
description:
Dutch Treats Match 3 a very unique match game! Own your own grow facility & farm. Start off small and "GROW" to industrial size. In a Match 3 style game collect your harvest! Many special gems to grab on the way! 

Play on more than one device with retrieve user. 

Version 3 Update => New Farming Levels to increase your higher profits!!
Compete against others with, Global Score Boards!
